KeyCombination(string)

Construct a new instance from string representation provided by ToString().

public KeyCombination(string keys)

Parameters

keys string

A comma-separated (KeyCode in integer) string representation of the keys.

Remarks

This constructor is not optimized. Hot paths are assumed to use FromInputState(InputState, Vector2?).
